item.title: Fix for Sulley’s Beyond ProMods Middle-East Road Connection v1.1 ETS2
item.description:
Fix for Sulley’s Beyond ProMods Middle-East Road Connection v1.1 ETS2

Fixed Company Conflict and semaphore conflict between beyond and pmme
Compatibility: 1.50

Required Map
Beyond – ProMods Middle-East Road Connection



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Isle of Man Fix for ProMods v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Isle of Man Fix for ProMods v1.0 ETS2

Fixes ProMods Isle of Man using North Macedonia Local Regulations instead of its own.

Requires ProMods Europe 2.70
Make sure to put this mod above ProMods Europe in the load order!
Compatibility: 1.50



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania RJL Interior Bundle v1.2 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Scania RJL Interior Bundle v1.2 1.50 ETS2

Features:
– Custom Interior
– 4 interior variants
– Custom lighting with serveral colors
– Curtains (removable)
– Interior is also visible from outside
– Custom vabis & stock steering wheels
– Custom table with lights
– High quality AO bakes
– LHD & for Topline cab only
– Tested on latest version 1.50.x



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Engine Sound Megapack v1.50 ATS
item.description:
Engine Sound Megapack v1.50 ATS

Changelogs
– Compatibility for 1.50

What’s that sound pack adds to the game?
This mod adds those engines and their sounds in the game:

– Detroit Diesel DD13
– Detroit Diesel DD15
– Detroit Diesel 8V92
– Detroit Diesel 12V71T
– Detroit Diesel 60 series
– Cummins 444
– Cummins M11
– Cummins X15
– Cummins Signature 600
– Cummins N14
– Cummins ISX (SCS sound reworked)
– Cummins ISX STRAIGHT PIPED (SCS sounds and from videos)
– Caterpillar V8 3408
– Caterpillar 3406E
– Caterpillar C15 Straight Piped
– Caterpillar C15 STOCK
– Paccar MX series
– Mack MP8
– Volvo D13

Supported trucks :
– Kenworth W900
– Kenworth T680
– Kenworth T680 2022
– Kenworth W990 GTM
– Kenworth T800 GTM
– Kenworth K100
– Kenworth T600
– Mack Anthem
– Mack CHU613
– Freightliner FLB by Harven
– Freightliner Cascadia 2020(SCS)
– Peterbilt 567 GTM
– Peterbilt 389 SCS version and Viper’s
– Peterbilt 579
– Peterbilt 387
– Peterbilt 386
– International Lonestar
– International LT
– International 9900i
– Volvo VNL (SCS)
– Volvo VNL 2018
– Western Star 49X
– Western Star 57X
– Western Star 5700XE



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
